name: Silent Hazard
description:
SILENT HAZARD STORY:

The story is about a guy who has a mental disorder. Medicines and help from doctors did their job and everything was fine.. until the guy witnessed the murder.
This reminded him of the tragedy that happened in his life 10 years ago. Because of the memories, the disease worsened.

CONTROL:

W/A/S/D - walk.
LMB - interact.
Left Shift - run.
F - flashlight.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

OS: Windows 7 SP1, 8.1, 10 (Only 64-bit).
Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster.
Memory: 2 GB.
Video Card/DirectX Version: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card.
Storage: 1 GB.
Control: Keyboard/Mouse/Touch/Gamepad Xbox.

ANDROID GAME ANDROID CONTROL:

Joystick - walk.
A - interact.
B - flashlight.
Free Touch - camera.

ANDROID SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

OS: Android 5.0
GPUs: Adreno 4xx, Mali T6xx and above.
